articles.title: COVID hit HIV detection in Europe, threatens eradication progress - Reuters UK
articles.description: The number of people in Europe with undiagnosed HIV has risen as testing rates fell during the COVID-19 pandemic, threatening a global goal of ending the disease by 2030, a report said.
articles.content: LONDON, Nov 30 (Reuters) - The number of people in Europe with undiagnosed HIV has risen as testing rates fell during the COVID-19 pandemic, threatening a global goal of ending the disease by 2030, a… [+1749 chars]

articles.title: Multi-country outbreak of Salmonella Mbandaka ST413 possibly linked to consumption of chicken meat in the EU/EEA, Israel and the UK - European Centre for Disease
articles.description: A cross-border outbreak of Salmonella Mbandaka ST413 has been ongoing in the EU/EEA, Israel, and the UK since September 2021.
articles.content: Based on case interviews from Finland and the UK, ready-to-eat (RTE) chicken products and/or fresh chicken meat are the likely vehicles of infection. Fifteen cases in Finland reported consumption of … [+1255 chars]

articles.title: Europe's first Mars rover Rosalind Franklin now set to launch in 2028 - SiliconRepublic.com
articles.description: Months after the ESA severed ties with Roscosmos, member states have invested €360m to ensure the Rosalind Franklin rover lands on Mars.
articles.content:
Months after the ESA severed ties with Roscosmos, putting the fate of the mission up in the air, a 360m investment will help ensure the rover lands on Mars.
